wikipedia_page.main: Danny Houghton (born 25 September 1988) is an English rugby league footballer who plays as a hooker for Hull F.C. in the Super League. He has played his entire career for his hometown club Hull FC. He is an England Knights international.

response: On 13 August 2015 Hull re-signed Washbrook on a two-year deal, with coach Lee Radford saying he returns a better player than the last time he was at the club. Washbrook can play loose forward or cover Danny Houghton at hooker and cover in the centres despite not being a centre by trade.
